overview: A young man meets a young woman and both fall for each other. A house is built, children are born, the fairy tale story of  boundless  love  takes  its  course.  A  grandson  sets  out  to  explore  the  myth  of  his  grandparentsâ€™ romance and tries to honour his deceased grandfather on film, assisted by all the surviving relatives. Not an easy undertaking when things may not have been exactly as the family tradition would have it.
title: The Blunder of Love
